name: part_010
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら３周年 ⧸ 3DLIVE】Chu! Summer Party♪【ホロライブ】 [Di8D8BvZZp0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'secret base ～君がくれたもの～'.
MC section after the song performance where the members congratulate Pekora.

subtitles.original: 僕は照れくさそうにカバンで顔を隠しながら
subtitles.english: Blushing, I hid my face behind my bag...

subtitles.original: 本当はとてもとても嬉しかったよ
subtitles.english: ...but the truth is, I was very, very happy.

subtitles.original: あぁ 花火が夜空 綺麗に咲いて ちょっとせつなく
subtitles.english:
Ah, fireworks bloom beautifully in the night sky,
feeling a bit bittersweet.

subtitles.original: あぁ 風が時間とともに流れる
subtitles.english: Ah, the wind flows along with time.

subtitles.original: 嬉しくて 楽しくて 冒険もいろいろしたね
subtitles.english:
We were happy, having fun,
and went on all sorts of adventures.

subtitles.original: 二人の秘密の基地の中
subtitles.english: Inside our secret base.

subtitles.original: 君と夏の終わり 将来の夢 大きな希望 忘れない
subtitles.english:
I won't forget that end of summer with you,
our dreams for the future, and our great hopes.

subtitles.original: 10年後の8月 また出会えるのを 信じて
subtitles.english:
Believing that we'll meet again in August,
ten years from now.

subtitles.original: 君が最後まで心から 「ありがとう」叫んでいたこと 知ってたよ
subtitles.english:
I knew that you were shouting "thank you"
from the bottom of your heart until the very end.

subtitles.original: 涙をこらえて 笑顔でさよなら せつないよね
subtitles.english:
Holding back tears and saying goodbye with a smile
is painful, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 最高の思い出を...
subtitles.english: To the best of memories...

subtitles.original: あぁ 夏休みもあと少しで終わっちゃうから
subtitles.english: Ah, because summer vacation is almost over...

subtitles.original: あぁ 太陽と月 仲良くして
subtitles.english: Ah, let the sun and moon get along.

subtitles.original: 悲しくて 寂しくて 喧嘩もいろいろしたね
subtitles.english:
We were sad, feeling lonely,
and had all sorts of fights.

subtitles.original: 二人の秘密の基地の中
subtitles.english: Inside our secret base.

subtitles.original: 君が最後まで心から 「ありがとう」叫んでいたこと 知ってたよ
subtitles.english:
I knew that you were shouting "thank you"
from the bottom of your heart until the very end.

subtitles.original: 涙をこらえて 笑顔でさよなら せつないよね
subtitles.english:
Holding back tears and saying goodbye with a smile
is painful, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 最高の思い出を...
subtitles.english: To the best of memories...

subtitles.original: 突然の...
subtitles.english: Suddenly...

subtitles.original: 転校で...
subtitles.english: you transferred schools...

subtitles.original: どうしようもなく
subtitles.english: and there was nothing I could do.

subtitles.original: 手紙書くよ 電話もするよ
subtitles.english: I'll write letters, I'll call you.

subtitles.original: 忘れないでね 僕のことを
subtitles.english: Don't forget me.

subtitles.original: いつまでも二人の基地の中
subtitles.english: Always inside our base.

subtitles.original: 君と夏の終わり ずっと話して 夕日を見てから星を眺め
subtitles.english:
At the end of summer with you, we talked forever,
watched the sunset, and then gazed at the stars.

subtitles.original: 君の頬を流れた涙はずっと忘れない
subtitles.english:
I'll never forget the tears
that flowed down your cheeks.

subtitles.original: 君が最後まで大きく手を振ってくれたこと きっと忘れない
subtitles.english:
I'll surely never forget how you waved your hand
so wide until the very end.

subtitles.original: だからこうして夢の中で ずっと永遠に...
subtitles.english:
So, just like this, inside a dream,
forever and ever...

subtitles.original: 君と夏の終わり 将来の夢 大きな希望 忘れない
subtitles.english:
I won't forget that end of summer with you,
our dreams for the future, and our great hopes.

subtitles.original: 10年後の8月 また出会えるのを 信じて
subtitles.english:
Believing that we'll meet again in August,
ten years from now.

subtitles.original: 君が最後まで心から 「ありがとう」叫んでいたこと 知ってたよ
subtitles.english:
I knew that you were shouting "thank you"
from the bottom of your heart until the very end.

subtitles.original: 涙をこらえて 笑顔でさよなら せつないよね
subtitles.english:
Holding back tears and saying goodbye with a smile
is painful, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 最高の思い出を...
subtitles.english: To the best of memories...

subtitles.original: 最高の思い出を...
subtitles.english: To the best of memories...

subtitles.original: (歓声)
subtitles.english: (Cheering)

subtitles.original: なんだこの空気は
subtitles.english: What's with this atmosphere?

subtitles.original: この空気は...
subtitles.english: This atmosphere...

subtitles.original: ぺこら ぺこらちゃん 3周年おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Pekora, Pekora-chan... Congrats on your 3rd anniversary!

subtitles.original: いや みんな来てくれて本当にありがとう イェーイ！
subtitles.english: No, thank you everyone so much for coming! Yay!

subtitles.original: いや 夏メロメドレー めちゃくちゃ斬新で良かった！
subtitles.english: Man, that nostalgic summer medley was so fresh and great!

subtitles.original: みんなでね それぞれなんか歌いたい曲とか
subtitles.english: Everyone chose songs they wanted to sing...

subtitles.original: でもね ぺこら シークレットベースもすごかったんだけど め組の人！
subtitles.english:
But you know, Pekora, "Secret Base" was great,
but "Megumi no Hito"!

subtitles.original: め組のぺこらだよ
subtitles.english: It's Megumi no Pekora!

subtitles.original: 楽しかったね。ね、旦那様もみんなでさ
subtitles.english: It was fun. Right, Danna-sama and everyone?

subtitles.original: 久しぶりに歌えて本当に良かった ぺこら。
subtitles.english: It was great singing together again after so long, Pekora.

subtitles.original: なんか3周年 エモいね。
subtitles.english: 3rd anniversary... it's emotional.

subtitles.original: エモエモだね。これからもよろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: Very emotional. Please continue to support me.

subtitles.original: お願いします。じゃあもうぺこら 配信終わりっすか？
subtitles.english: Please do. So, Pekora, is the stream ending now?

subtitles.original: あ 違う 違う まだ。この後にもうちょびっとだけあるぺこら。
subtitles.english: Oh, no, no, not yet! There's a little bit more after this, peko.

subtitles.original: え、何があるの？秘密？
subtitles.english: Eh, what is it? A secret?
